data.actual_result: Keyboard flickers and makes u being stuck for a while
data.expected_result: Keyboard shouldn't flicker when quickly adding/removing letters
data.short_description: Keyboard keeps flickering when typing in the boxes of Xbox Authorization (Could be on iOS 11+ only, but does happens on iOS 11.4)
data.steps_to_repro: - go to Connections - add xbox live - tap quickly both g and X (delete/remove letter) button fast together (as in tap both buttons fast) (tiny fingers required) - observe your keyboard
